content:
What a wonderful idea! A personalized gift tag with a sweet message can add an extra special touch to the gift. Here are some suggestions for gift tag ideas and messages that would be suitable for a niece:

**Gift Tag Ideas:**

1. A small, decorative card with a ribbon or twine tie
2. A tiny, ceramic or porcelain token with a sweet message
3. A small, paper flower or butterfly with a personalized message
4. A miniature, ornate frame with a special quote or message

**Message Ideas:**

1. "Happy Birthday to my favorite niece in the whole world!"
2. "Wishing you a year filled with laughter, love, and adventure!"
3. "You light up my life, just like this candle!"
4. "May your birthday be as bright and beautiful as you are!"
5. "I'm so grateful to be your aunt and to have you in my life."
6. "May all your dreams and wishes come true on your special day!"
7. "You're growing up to be an amazing young woman, and I'm so proud of you!"
8. "I hope your birthday is as sweet as you are!"

Remember to keep the message short, sweet, and personal. You could also include a inside joke or a special memory you share with your niece to make it even more meaningful.

I'm sure your niece will appreciate the thought and love you've put into selecting a special gift and adding a personalized touch with a gift tag and message.
